title: Game Lag
body: For some time now my lol has been laggy as soon as the game starts its fine but 10 seconds later its just sooooo bad and i dont know why

replies.body:
Around 6pm to 10pm I have been getting around about 150 ping in some games throughout, especially in aram, and that makes most adcs and skill shots useless. Have checked internet connection with Ookla and also modem settings/ status in browser, no problem with internet when not in-game (70 ping). 

Might be matchmaking system, because I don't normally get laggy normal games, instead aram games where not many people play. I would rather have to wait more than 5min for a 60 ping aram game, than a 150 ping piece of absolute munt. 

I am so sad, rito plz fix or I will either join ISIS or kill myself.
ive been getting serious lag spikes at peak times, i think its congestion? but its only been happening recently.
